role_description: An Ansible role that installs ShareX on Windows 10
role_description_full_overview: [ShareX](https://getsharex.com/) is a free and open source program that lets you capture or record any area of your screen and share it with a single press of a key. It also allows uploading images, text or other types of files to many supported destinations you can choose from.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs ShareX on Windows 10.
